description.value:
You are the descendant of great heroes from a lost civilization.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{Combat Casting}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{Exotic Weapon Proficiency}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.IER2MzJrjSvxMlNS]{Greater Weapon Focus}*,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.asmQDyDYTtuXg8b4]{Greater Weapon Specialization}*,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{Weapon Focus}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.YLCvMNeAF9V31m1h]{Weapon Specialization}*.

(The bloodrager counts his total bloodrager levels as fighter levels for the purpose of qualifying for any feats marked with an asterisk [*]. If he also has levels in fighter, these levels stack.)

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xco22162bwgxn7pj]{True Strike} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ze0kso9hxff5u2f]{False Life} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zpwd0f19q1lm04p3]{Phantom Steed} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.isfcr7k77gppxnwq]{Enlarge Person, Mass} (16th).
